property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Craft +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Attacker loses this solo op, retire the attacking agent. React Craft:After winning this solo op, discard this card: Gain 1 Victory Point or gain permanent control of a non-leader agent with expense less than 8.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Target a completed solo op in your headquarters. Actions on the solo op may be performed an additional time this turn. Intel Craft: Return a completed solo op you do not control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After an agent wins a solo op while in the defending mission team: Place the completed solo op in the Defender's headquarters as if he had won it as the Attacker and draw a card. Intel Craft: Give this agent +2 craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Chrisma 6: Discard a completed solo op in a player's headquaters. Mission Charisma: Give this agent +2 charisma.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat 10: If this is a fight mission ,target up to three opposing agents with a combined cover less than 11. Wound each target agent. If this is a Public mission, expose this agent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Combat +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents successfully activated while at this solo op have -2 combat at this solo op. Intel Craft: Target one of your agents. Increase the TN of actions by enemy agents targeting that agent by 3 until the end of the turn.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Transport +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents that move into this solo op with an action have +2 transport during this solo. Mission Transport X: Move target opposing agent to his headquarters. the TN is the target's transport.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Craft +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Franchise Only. Freelancer agents at this solo op have +1 to all skills. Mission Craft 6: Discard this discard: change this mission's type to intrigue, chase or fight. This agent may immediately perform an additional mission action.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Combat +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the attacker loses this solo op, he must remove from the game all action cards in his discard pile. React Craft: After winning this solo op, discard this card: Return an action card with a printed Mission action from your discard pile to your hand and draw a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Combat +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents cannot be moved to headquarters during this solo op. Mission Combat X: Wound target opposing agent. If this is a Public mission, expose this agent. The TN is the target's combat or cover, whichever is higher.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Charisma +2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your agents cannot be moved to headquarters during this solo op. Mission Charimsa: Give target opposing agent -3 to all skills until the end of the mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Transport +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Active agents assigned or moved into this solo op have -2 transport while at this solo op. Mission Transport X: Move this agent into your mission team. The TN is the mission's printed cover.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Craft +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Attacker loses this solo op, he must remove from the game all action cards in his discard pile. React Craft: After winning this solo op, discard this card. Return an action card with a printed Intel action from your discard pile ot your hand and draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma X: Target an enemy agent and an action printed on that agent. Permanently blank the action's text. This action may be perfomed as a Mission Charsima X action. The TN is the target's charisma.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport 7: Retire a Vehicle equipped to this agent: Retire all vehicles at this mission. Mission Transport: Give this agent +2 transport.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma 6: Enemy agents with expense less than 7 cannot assign to mission teams this turn. Your agents with expense less than 8 cannot assign to mission teams this turn.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Craft +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents have -2 to all skills except craft while at this solo op. React Craft: Before a card is activated, discard this card: Raise the activating agent's expense by 8 for that activation. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft 4: Name a skill. Give all agents with expense less than seven +1 to the name skill and -1 to all other skills until the end of the mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Transport +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the attacker loses this solo op, he must remove from the game all gear cards in his discard pile. React Craft: After winning this solo op, discard this card: Return a gear card in your discard pile to your hand and draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat 6: Attach Fortified Position to the current mission. While it is attached, the Attacker or Defender mission text (your choice) gains "Your agents have +3 cover. Actions targeting your agents have +1 TN."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport 7: Move all agents at this mission with expense less than 7 to headquarters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Combat +2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents at this solo op with expense less than 7 have -2 combat during this solo op. Mission Transport: Target an opposing agent with lower expense. Move the target agent to his headquarters.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Transport +2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow Patriots Only. The skills of each agent at this solo op are equal to the value of his lowest skill. Mission Transport: Give this agent a bonus to one of his skills equal to his lowest skill until the end of the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 3: Before this agent takes a wound: Prevent the wound, then move the agent to headquarters if he is in a mission team. This action can be performed by an agent at headquarters during a mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Transport +2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your agent cannot be wounded or perform actions that cause wounds during this solo op. React Transport 3: Before this agent suffers a wound: Prevent the wound. This action can be perfomed while at headquarters during a mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once per turn during the Debrief Phase you may return this card to your hand from your discard pile. React Combat: After target opposing attacking or defending player declares an action during a mission: Cancel the action and end the mission. The target player wins the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat 5: Attach Out in the Open to the current mission. While attached, the Attacker or Defender mission text (your choice)_ gains "Your agents have -3 to cover." Mission Combat 8: Return this card to your hand if you own this card and it is attached to a mission. Any agent can perform this action.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Charisma +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the attacker loses this solo op, he must remove from the game all agent cards in his discard pile. React Craft: After winning this solo op, discard this card: Return an agent card in your discard pile to your hand and draw a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Combat +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: After this solo op is won, expose the winning agent. Mission Combat 9: Discard this card: Wound target opposing agent twice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma X: Before a player assigns an agent to a solo op: Target an active non-leader agent that player controls. That player must assign the target to the solo op, if able. The TN is the highest skill on the agent's leader.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Charsima +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents at this solo op with expense greater than 8 have +2 charsima at this solo op. React Charisma: Before the costs of activating a target agent are met: Raise or lower the target's expense by 3.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Private - Combat +2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unwounded agents moving into this solo op with an action suffer a wound. Mission Combat: Wound an unwounded opposing agent. If this is a Public mission, expose this agent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodvine Only. The agent at this solo op with the highest expense has +2 charisma while at this solo op. React Charisma: After an agent is targted with an action, discard two cards from your hand: Redirect or cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 6: Examine the top 7 cards of your Agency Deck, or the top 12 cards if this agent is a Pointman. You may reveal a solo op card to all opponents. If you do, place the solo op in your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards into the deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat 6: Until the end of the mission, increase by 3 the TN of all actions performed by agents with expense less than 7.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Craft +2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents successfully activated while at this solo op have +2 craft at this solo op. React Craft: After a player declares an action: Examine target facedown card. Intel Craft 10: Discard this card: Gain 1 Victory Point.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Banshee Net

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Craft +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banshee Net Only. Expose any active agent that assigns or moves into this solo op. Intel Craft X: Expose a target enemy agent. The TN is the target's expense. Intel Craft: Give this agent +2 craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Can only be played as your first action at a mission. This action has a TN of 8 if the performing agent is a Franchise leader. Mission Craft 10: Discard a card: If this mission is not a solo op, discard the current mission and replace it, face up, with target mission in the mission queue. The target mission is now the mission being run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 6: After a player declares that he is extending the Mission Phase: Double the Objective Number of the mission he extends to after the normal extension multiplier is applied.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Charisma 6: Give this agent +1 to all skills until the end of the mission for each agent with the Faceman, Fixer, Pointman, Snoop, Soldier or Wheelman trait on your mission team, to a maximum of +1 per trait.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After an action targets one of your agents, discard a completed solo op in your headquarters: Redirect or cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat 7: Discard a card attached to this mission. If it was an action card, this agent may immediately perform any action on that card as if played from your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Solo Op - Public - Transport +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents with a Vehicle equipped cannot be moved to headquarters during this solo op. React Transport X: After an action targets this agent during a chase mission: cancel the action. The TN is the acting agent's transport.

property.value: Solo Op - Private - Charisma +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents use their base charisma for charisma skill checks during this solo op. Mission Charisma X: Reduce an opposing agent's base skill to 0 until the end of the mission. The TN is the target's charisma.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat X: Retire a target opposing Freelancer agent. the TN is the target's combat plus craft. Mission Combat: Give this agent +2 combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel combat X: Target two agents with the same name. Retire one or both of the agents. This action may be played as a Mission Combat X action. The TN is the expense of one of the target agents.

property.value: Solo Op - Public - Charsima +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agents at this solo op with expense less than 8 have +1 charisma at this solo op. React Charisma 5: After this agent is targeted by an agent with lower expense, discard a card from your hand: Cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport: Target a completed solo op in your headquarters: Move this agent from your headquarters into your mission team or vice versa. Mission Transport: Target a complese solo op in your headequarters: Give this agent +3 to a skill until the end of the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat: Attach Wire Fu to the current mission. While attached, all agnets at the mission may perform "React Combat: After this agent exceeds the TN of a Melee action by 3 or more: Wound the target of the Melee action if it is an agent. Agents at this mission may discard for bravado even if they already meet the TN."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Charisma 6: Give this agent +1 to all skills until the end of the mission for each other agent on his mission team that shares the Faceman, Fixer, Pointman, Snoop, Soldier, or Wheelman trait with him.

property.value: The Krypt

property.value: Ekaterina's actions cannot be cancelled. React Craft: After an action performed by an agent with expense less than 7 targets Ekaterina: Cancel the action.

property.value: Mission Combat 8: Retire all gear attached to a target opposing agent.

property.value: Oleg has +3 combat when performing Melee actions. Oleg may not be activated more than once per turn. React combat: After Oleg retires an enemy agent: Deactive Oleg.

property.value: Temujin will not attach Firearm gear. Mission Combat X: Wound an opposing agent. This is a Melee action. If this is a Public mission, expose Temujin. The TN is the target's combat plus craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gideon cannot be activated by a Franchise leader. After each Intel Phase begins, gain 1 Victory Point.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat X: Wound an opposing agent if this is a fight mission or a solo op. If this is a Public mission, expose Goran. The TN is the target's combat or cover, whichever is higher.

property.value: Fixer - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Target a Freelancer agent. The target's leader must meet the target's expense as if the target were being activated or else the target is retired.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Company man is retired when he has three wounds instead of two. While Company Man has two wounds, he has -3 to all skills instead of -2. React Craft: Before Company Man is retired: Shuffle him into your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport: Switch Mora's combat and transport until the end of the mission. Mora may immediately perform an additional Mission action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Completed solo ops attached to Stonefox may be used as if they were in your HQ and do not count as being in your HQ. React Craft: After one of your agents wins a solo op: Attach the solo op to Stonefox.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 6: After an action targets one of your active or inactive agents who is not on a mission team: Increase the TN of the action by 4.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Discard the top two cards of your Agency deck. You may place one of the discarded cards in your hand. If you do, discard two cards from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: President Winter can only be activated by a level 3 or 4 leader. Intel Charisma: Target a mission in the mission queue and turn the mission face up if necessary. The mission's type is changed to fight until the end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reynolds has +4 expense for activating aircraft. Reynolds has +1 to all skills while he has an aircraft equipped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After successfully activating Rosy during a mission: Increase the TN of the next mission action declared by an enemy agent by 4.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scytale's base transport cannot be reduced below 6. Mission Transport X: Blank the text box and skill bonuses on target Vehicle until the end of the mission. The TN is the vehicle's expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Targeno cannot activate Armor. Targeno has +3 cover. React combat: After Targeno declares an action: Reduce a target agent's cover by 4 until after the action is resolved.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Discard a gear card from your hand: Tinker gains +2 to any skill and either the Faceman, Pointman, Snoop, Soldier or Wheelman trait until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport X: After an agent moves into a mission team due to an action: Move the agent to his headquarters. The TN is the target's transport.

property.value: React Charisma X: After a combat or transport action targets your leader: Redirect the action to Bruno. The TN is the acting agent's craft.

property.value: Intel Craft 7: Target the first intrigue mission in the discard pile. Discard the first mission in the mission queue and replace it, face up, with the target mission. Intel Charisma: Give target non-leader agent +3 or -3 expense until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Equip Cell Phone Taser from your hand to this agent and activate it. This agent may immediately perform an additional Mission action. Mission Craft X: Give an opposing agent -2 to all skills. The TN is the target's craft or cover, whichever is higher.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft X: Wound an opposing agent. Expose this agent if this is a Public mission. The TN is the target's craft or cover, whichever is higher.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport: After this agent is moved to headquarters from a solo op: Move this agent into the solo op. Mission Transport: Remove a wound from this agent if this agent is a solo op.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Auto - Armor

property.name: Rules
property.value: +3 cover. React Craft 6: After an agent declares a combat action: Reduce the TN of the action by 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React craft: After a player draws a card outside the Debrief Phase: Examine the card. You may retire the Document Scanner to discard the card and draw a card. This agent may perform this action any number of times per turn.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gadget - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: Before this agent declares an action: Target an Intel or Mission action (as appropriate) on an active non-unique gear in play. Everything Case copies the target action. This agent then performs the copied action as his declared action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat 5: Place 5 Stun counters on the current mission. Remove a Stun counter after each time a player passes or meets the TN of an action. All actions performed by agents without Armor have +1 TN for each Stun counter on the mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Aircraft

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Transport: Move Harrier Jump Jet to another one of your agents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma 6: After an action by an opposing agent targets this agent during an intrigue mission or a solo op: Raise the TN of the action by 3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2 cover. During a solo op, this agent has a +1 to all skills and +2 cover (+4 cover in total).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Auto

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 cover. Mission Combat 6: Give all enemy agents -4 cover until the end of the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Target the first fight mission in the discard pile. Discard the first mission in the mission queue and replace it, face up, with the target mission. React Combat 7: After a combat action targets an agent: Give the agent +3 combat or +3 cover until the end of the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Equip Pepper Spray from your hand to this agent and activate it. This agent may immediately perform an additional mission action. React Craft 5: After an action targets this agent during a mission: Give the acting agent -2 to all skills until the end of the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 6: Before an action moves exactly one target agent to or from headquarters: Cancel this action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Target the first chase mission in the discard pile. Discard the first mission in the mission queue and replace it, face up, with the target mission. Mission Transport 7: Move an agent from your headquarters into your mission team.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Move this agent to headquarters: Move target agent in your headquarters into your mission team. You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat: Retire a Vehicle in the opposing mission team.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Aircraft

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport: Remove a wound from an agent who has a Vehicle attached. React Transport 7: Before another Vehicle would be retired by an action performed by an enemy agent, discard a card: Return the Vehicle to its owner's hand.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Krypt

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat: Before determining the starting player at a mission; Give Joseph +10 craft for the purposes of determining the starting player. If Joseph uses this ability, he must perform your first Mission action.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Krypt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Until the end of the game, you may have any number of completed solo ops with the same name in your headquarters.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Rules
property.value: "Alice" has +2 to all skills while on a mission opposed by an agent who is not the same faction as his leader.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Patriots

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After one of your agents declares an action: Give the agent +3 to a skill until the end of the turn. Michael may perform this as a React Craft 9 action. If he does, give the declaring agent +4 to a skill instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While Carol Anne is in play, the Franchise leader action raises or lowers the objective number of a mission by 3 instead of by 2 and your leader may perform the Franchise leader action while at headquarters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Pointman - Master: Jericho

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Transport X: Target an enemy agent. Until the end of turn, actions targeting that agent have +3 TN and cannot be redirected and any Mission action that wounds the enemy agent wounds him again. TheTN is the target's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Retire one of your Freelancer agents: Name an angent with an expense equal to or lower than the retired agent's. Search your Agency deck for the named agent, put him into play, and activate him.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Soldier - Henchman: Derek Blake

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jericho's actions cannot be cancelled. Actions targeting Jericho have +3 TN. Mission Combat: Target an opposing agent. Retire one gear on the agent, if he has any, then wound the agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat X: After an action is redirected to Felicia: Wound the agent performing the redirected action. The TN is the action agent's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Action performed by opposing non-leader agents whose base stats are zero have +3 TN.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Banshee Net

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Discard two cards from your hand: Target an opponent, who must discard two cards at random from his hand.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Banshee Net

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 4: After an Exposed agent declares an action: Cancel the action. IF the declaring agent was a leader, Siouxsie permanently loses this ability.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Nine Tiger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Father of Blades may attach two Melee gear, even if they share a name or traits. React Combat: After the game begins: Until the end of the game, all Firearms your own produce Melee actions.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Nine Tiger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Opposing agents may not perform actions on Firearms. Your Soldier agents have +1 combat. React Craft: After a combat action is declared: Cancel the action.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Public - Craft +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, you may place a number of Activiation Tokens equal to your leader's expense, divided as you choose, on any of your inactive leaders. Defender: If you win this mission, you may place a number of Activation Tokens equal to your leader's expense, divided as you choose, on any of your inactive leaders.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Private - Charisma +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, gain 2 Victory Points or give an opponent -3 Victory Points. This cannot reduce a player below zero Victory Points. Defender: If you win this mission, gain 2 Victory Points or give an opponent -3 Victory Points. This cannot reduce a player below zero Victory Points.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public -Transport +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you successfully perform four Mission Trasnport actions, you immediately win the mission. All actions performed by your agents have +1 TN at this mission. Defender: After each time an enemy agent successfully performs a Mission action, increase the TN for all actions performed by enemy agents at this mission by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Public - Combat +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: After each time a non-Exposed agent becomes Exposed or baffled during this mission, give that agent a Bullet token and remove all other Bullet tokens from the game. Defender: After the Attacker and Defender pass consecutively, retire any agent with a Bullet token.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Effects that would expose an agent or that would result in an agent being considered Exposed at this mission wound that agent as well as producing their normal effects. Defender: Effects that would expose an agent or that would result in an agent being considered Exposed at this mission wound that agent as well as producing their normal effects.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Private - Combat +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, search your Agency Deck for up to one Unique card and up to one non-Unique card, reveal them to your opponents and put them in your hand. Defender: If you win this mission, you may retire the Attacker's active leader.
